definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (lofty tree (s coll.?) i.e. palms? cf. Di Ge 14:6) town & harbour, N.E. arm of Red Sea, hence called Ælanitic Gulf (= Gulf of Akaba, fr. neighbouring fortress) De 2:8, 2Ki 14:22, 2Ki 16:6, 2Ki 16:6 (perh. later designat. for fuller [[איל פארן]] q.v.) = LXX Ai)lwn, Ai)laq Gr. Ai)lana etc.; = [[אֵלָה]] (? Ge 36:41 v. Di), [[אֵילוֹת]] infr.
